    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d81c98-b35c-43c9-2f43-c3f066f4c43d#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A későgótika képzőművészete</string>
            <string language="en">fine art of late gothic art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">feine kunst der späten gotischen kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art fin d'art gothique en retard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte fina da arte gothic atrasada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte fine di arte gotica ritardata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεπτή τέχνη της πρόσφατης γοτθικής τέχνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte fino del último arte gótico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A későgótika képzőművészete Közép-Európában</string>
            <string language="en">fine art of late gothic art in middle Europe</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">15. száazd,  későgótika,  Fouquet, Jean,  Charonton, Enguerrand,  Riemenschneider, Tilmann,  Stoss, Veit,  szárnyasoltár,  </string>
            <string language="en">15th century, late gothic, Fouquet, Jean, Charonton, Enquerrna, Riemenschneider, Tilmann, Stoss, Veit, winged oltar, </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">feine kunst der späten gotischen kunst in 
mittlerem Europa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art fin d'art gothique en retard en Europe 
moyenne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte fina da arte gothic atrasada em Europa 
média</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte fine di arte gotica ritardata in Europa 
centrale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεπτή τέχνη της πρόσφατης γοτθικής τέχνης στη μέση 
Ευρώπη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte fino del último arte gótico en Europa 
media</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">15. Jahrhundert, spätes gotisches, Fouquet, Jean, 
Charonton, Enquerrna, Riemenschneider, Tilmann, Stoss, Veit, winged 
oltar,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">15ème siècle, gothique en retard, Fouquet, Jean, 
Charonton, Enquerrna, Riemenschneider, Tilmann, Stoss, Veit, oltar à 
ailes,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">1ö século, gothic atrasado, Fouquet, Jean, Charonton, 
Enquerrna, Riemenschneider, Tilmann, Stoss, Veit, oltar voado,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quindicesimo secolo, gotico ritardato, Fouquet, Jean, 
Charonton, Enquerrna, Riemenschneider, Tilmann, Stoss, Veit, oltar 
alato,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">15$ος αιώνας, πρόσφατος γοτθικός, Fouquet, Jean, 
Charonton, Enquerrna, Riemenschneider, Tilmann, Stoss, 
Veit, φτερωτός oltar,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">décimo quinto siglo, último gótico, Fouquet, Jean, 
Charonton, Enquerrna, Riemenschneider, Tilmann, Stoss, Veit, oltar con
alas,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
